name: European Maritime Pilots' Association
goal: EMPA is a non-profit organization, created in 1963. EMPA represents about 5000 maritime pilots from 24 European countires, including Norway, Croatia, Turkey, Ukraine and Georgia. The role of EMPA is to facilitate the exchange of information between its members in order to continuously improve the professional and technical proficiency of maritime pilots in the EU and surrounding countries.
interests: Competition, Education and training, Maritime affairs and fisheries, Trans-European Networks, Transport
euInitiatives: EU Port Package, SAGMAS, Safety and Security, TEN, European Shipping Week
